text: Sadhayo or Sadhaya (Sindhi: سڌايا) is a Sindhi Sammattribe primarily found in the provinces of Sindh and Balochistan, Pakistan. The Sadhayo people speak Sindhi and follow Islam. ==Sub-Clans== * Darani * Dandani * Jagirani * Sakhirani * Umrani ==Related pages== * Sindh * Sindhi people == References == Category:Ethnic groups in Sindh Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Tribes of Pakistan
title: Sadhayo (tribe)
